name: Marco

topics.topic_text: Oh yeah? Why shouldn't I just tell them what you're up to?
topics.response_text: Why would you? They'll probably thank you for the information with a bullet to the head. They don't give a rat's ass about you.

topics.topic_text: I guess you're right. What are you working on?
topics.response_text: Weapons. Lot's of 'em. There's something coming... and soon.

topics.topic_text: I need a weapon. Can you help me out?
topics.response_text: I don't know you, stranger. I need these for the boys I know are dedicated to the cause.

topics.topic_text: I'll leave you to it, then.

description:
Marco is a 32 year-old Asian (mutated due to exposure to the toxic environment of The Pitt) Male.

A mechanically-minded slave working in The Pitt's rotary press control room, maintaining the equipment while secretly constructing improvised weaponry for the rebellion.

Marco's Personality: Resourceful, intelligent, and quietly rebellious. Marco maintains a low profile while harboring a strong desire for freedom and justice for his fellow slaves.

Marco's Backstory: Born into slavery in The Pitt, Marco has spent his entire life working in the Mill's harsh conditions. Despite his circumstances, he has developed a natural talent for machinery and engineering, becoming an expert in maintaining the Mill's equipment. Over the years, he has been secretly gathering resources and constructing improvised weaponry, aligning himself with the rebellion led by Midea and Wernher. He sees the rebellion as the only path to freedom for himself and his fellow slaves.
